document.full_text: japanese manufacturers' business sentiment improved slightly in the three months to march, the bank of japan's closely watched tankan survey showed, but analysts anticipate a downturn in confidence this quarter following last month's devastating earthquake and tsunami and a subsequent nuclear safety crisis.
document.title: japan business mood edges up, quake impact looms: boj tankan
lines_and_colors: japanese manufacturers' business sentiment improved slightly in the three months to march, the bank of japan's closely watched tankan survey showed, but analysts anticipate a downturn in confidence this quarter following last month's devastating earthquake and tsunami and a subsequent nuclear safety crisis.
